info.name: Mozilla.org Rebra Deki
info.description:
New version 1.0.1 alpha has been released!
Caution! It's much alpha version. You may confront with over 9000 bugs that can damage your neural health. :D Joke, I looked many pages and did see little bit. Tell me that Mozilla's resourses are you using? Mozilla has made a rebranding and presented the some new website design. They has worked and made main page. And here I revealed myself and have made an impingement! The title is not without reason. The style kills new actually desing of Mozilla.org, for example, I have cut the scrolling in more than 2 times. And it's not all. Install and you will see yourself.
info.additionalInfo:
Uncommon effect:
- dark|black design... sometimes.

Release notes.
1.0.1 alpha
- fixed critical bug for mozilla.org
- fixed critical bug for some pages
- fixed header for some pages
- fixed some problem for fullhd
- changed footer
- added some new rules
- code optimization
1.0 alpha
- has been published
